pageContext.course_type_long_description: Power up your engineering skills with Play-Well TEKnologies and tens of thousands of LEGOÂ® parts! Apply real-world concepts in physics, engineering, and architecture through engineer-designed projects such as: Hot Air Balloons, Space Stations, Tugboats, and the Eiffel Tower. Design and build as never before, and explore your craziest ideas in a supportive environment. There are no prerequisites for this course.
